PlayerBasicAttack.Narrative: lunges forward with a basic strike.

EmberBlast.Narrative: unleashes a burst of searing flames.

VoidPulse.Narrative: sends out a disorienting shockwave of dark energy.

NatureReclaim.Narrative: summons thorny vines that lash out.

IceSpear.Narrative: hurls a sharp spear of ice.

ShadowLurk.Narrative: melds into the shadows, becoming unseen.

LightningStrike.Narrative: calls down a fierce bolt of lightning.

EarthquakeStomp.Narrative: slams the ground, causing the earth to tremble.

FrostBite.Narrative: exposes the target to extreme cold, biting into flesh.

SpectralFang.Narrative: bites with ethereal teeth, instilling deep fear.

BlazingMeteor.Narrative: summons a meteor from the heavens to scorch the earth.

GaleForce.Narrative: unleashes a powerful wind, forcing enemies back.

DarkPact.Narrative: binds the target with a curse, weakening their resolve.

ThunderClap.Narrative: creates a deafening sound, stunning those nearby.

SolarFlare.Narrative: emits a blinding light, overwhelming foes.

VenomousBite.Narrative: bites with toxic fangs, injecting venom.

SonicScream.Narrative: emits a piercing scream, disorienting the target.

InfernalWrath.Narrative: engulfs the area in flames, inciting fury.

CrystalShield.Narrative: surrounds the ally with a protective crystal barrier.
